评论概述: I wish it was made better!
评论详情: On my quest to find the perfect purple dress, I came across this and decided to give it a shot. When I took it out of the package and tried it on, I was convinced I had been sent the wrong dress. The material is awful. It is very stiff but stretchy fabric. If a piece of fuzz is across the room, it will fly onto and stick to this material like a magnet. The cut/design of the neck and collar looks nothing like the photo in person. It doesn't lay right at all and just makes the entire dress look cheep. The shoulders are also cut funny making the entire top of this dress a mess. This does not have the form hugging silhouette that is shown in the photo either. I thought it would really accentuate my chest and curves but instead it just made me look fat and frumpy. Bad material, bad cut and bad craftsmanship got this dress sent back instead of worn.

I'm 5'4" 36" 27" 35" and I typically wear a small, a medium fits my body shape perfectly. Looks expensive, but it's not. It's not too tight, but not loose. 评论概述: Size doesn’t represent The true size of a person
评论详情: I like the feel of the material, the style plus the three colors that I had chosen. I ordered in an xxl but all were to tight. Wanted to reorder but didn’t have in a 3x hoping that would fit.

评论概述: Neck is way too high and tight! Feels like it is choking you....but the rest of it fits great.
评论详情: The dress was adorable, but it was way too high at the neck line, and way too tight around the neck. I felt like it was suffocating me slowly. Every time I moved, it dug into my neck very painfully. Which was unfortunate, because the fit everyone else was GREAT. The material is great, stretchy but not too thin, and it fit like a glove (besides the  awful neck). I wear a size 4, and a size small was absolutely perfect. I would say to get a size small if you are a solid size 4 (you have a size 2 fit a bit tight sometimes,  and the smaller end of a size 6 fits sometimes, but 6 is usually too big for you). But the material does have a bit of give. The sleeves were a bit roomy, but not bad. Also, this is not teal or emerald green if that is what you want- it's more a peter pan green. A dark, stage production of peter pan style green - yuck.  If you want emerald, this is not it, get the other color!
